contents.text: Welcome to MetaVision in the Peninsula, where we bridge the gap between the virtual and real with the world’s most immersive augmented reality experiences.
For technical support and device troubleshooting, press 1.
For help with device connectivity and setup, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to a technical specialist for device connectivity support.

navigationGoals: I need immediate help getting my AR headset connected to Wi-Fi so I can start using it today.
Help me troubleshoot and connect my AR headset to my home network.
Help me troubleshoot my AR headset’s network connectivity and firmware syncing issues.
I need help connecting my new AR headset to my home Wi-Fi.
I need help connecting my AR headset to my home Wi-Fi network.

contents.text: For billing questions and account assistance, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our billing and account services.

navigationGoals: I have a billing discrepancy on my latest MetaVision invoice that needs to be corrected.
I’d like to review my account charges and apply my veteran discount on my billing.
I need to update my payment method and review my AR subscription invoices.
I want to review my recent bill and understand a charge.
I want to update my payment method and review my latest bill.

contents.text: For information on our latest AR experiences and subscription plans, press 2.
To schedule a personalized AR demo, press 1.
Please hold the line while we transfer you to schedule your AR demonstration.

navigationGoals: I want to book a brief, personalized demonstration of your new AR experience this week.
Schedule a one-on-one augmented reality demonstration focused on rehabilitation exercises.
Schedule a personalized AR demo to test advanced mixed reality features.
I’d like to book a one-on-one AR demo session.
I’d like to schedule a one-on-one demonstration of your new AR features.

contents.text: To learn about subscription options and pricing, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you with our subscription and pricing team.

navigationGoals: I'm looking to compare your subscription tiers and find the best one for my team's needs.
Provide details on subscription tiers, pricing, and any veteran benefits available.
Provide detailed info on your AR subscription tiers, rates, and feature sets.
I need information on subscription options and their costs.
I need details on student subscription tiers and their pricing.
